#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int n;
    char a[11],b[6];
    cin>>n;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin>>a>>b;
        int j=0,cnt=0,c=0;
        for(int k=0;k<5;k++){
            if(a[k]==b[0]&&a[k+1]==b[1]&&a[k+2]==b[2]&&a[k+3]==b[3]&&a[k+4]==b[4]){
                c++;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(c==1){
            cout<<"1"<<endl;
        }
        else
        cout<<"0"<<endl;
    }
}
